title: It’s Finally Time to Supercharge XRP’s Utility. Here’s the Latest
body: Crypto researcher SMQKE (@SMQKEDQG) shared new details on X about Ripple’s next phase following its completed acquisition of Hidden Road . The post referenced a document outlining how this move positions Ripple to “expand from being primarily a cross-border payments and crypto liquidity provider into a full-scale institutional finance player.” He shared an image which features highlighted excerpts from the document showing how the acquisition directly connects Ripple’s technology with institutional finance through Hidden Road’s established client base. SMQKE’s post emphasized that “Hidden Road plans to migrate its post-trade clearing onto XRPL, showcasing the blockchain’s ability to handle high-volume institutional flows.” This statement points to a significant development for XRP, as the integration of post-trade clearing could mark one of the most substantial use cases of the XRP Ledger (XRPL) in institutional markets to date. With Ripple’s acquisition of Hidden Road finalized, it’s finally time to “SUPERCHARGE XRP’S UTILITY.” “Hidden Road plans to migrate its post-trade clearing onto XRPL, showcasing the blockchain's ability to handle high-volume institutional flows.” Documented. https://t.co/dBZk7dYa7H pic.twitter.com/FstGAkPvyL — SMQKE (@SMQKEDQG) October 24, 2025 Ripple’s Strategic Position in Institutional Finance The document describes Ripple’s motivation for the acquisition as a “bold move” that gives the company a new position in the financial ecosystem. Ripple now gains a platform capable of offering prime brokerage services such as trading, custody, financing, and clearing “to hedge funds and financial institutions.” This signals an expansion well beyond retail or transactional crypto services toward serving institutional clients at scale . Brad Garlinghouse, Ripple’s CEO, called the acquisition a “once-in-a-lifetime opportunity” that allows crypto firms access to traditional markets and vice versa. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Hidden Road’s existing infrastructure and relationships with large financial entities provide Ripple with immediate access to institutional capital markets. Through this network, Ripple aims to connect traditional asset markets with digital liquidity using the XRP Ledger as the operational foundation. Enhancing XRP’s Real-World Utility A key excerpt from the document notes that this integration “could supercharge XRP’s utility as well.” By linking Hidden Road’s trade settlement processes to XRPL, Ripple demonstrates how its blockchain can be used for institutional-grade efficiency. The ability to process post-trade clearing on XRPL positions the network as a potential standard for large-scale financial operations where reliability and speed are critical. The announcement suggests that Ripple is entering a new competitive tier in the fintech landscape. While XRP has long been associated with cross-border payment efficiency, its use in post-trade clearing could establish its relevance in the broader settlement infrastructure that underpins institutional trading. The document also indicates that Ripple’s stablecoin strategy and collateral systems will align with this institutional push, further embedding XRP within its financial framework. The focus on expanding XRP’s practical use , rather than speculative value, reinforces Ripple’s intent to strengthen its foothold among global financial institutions. title: Ripple completes its acquisition of Hidden Road
body: Stablecoin issuer and cross-border payment platform Ripple has completed its acquisition of Hidden Road to launch Ripple Prime, the first global multi-asset prime broker owned by a crypto company. According to the company’s press statement published Friday, Ripple first announced its plan to acquire the global credit network in early April. The firm believes Hidden Road is one of the fastest-growing non-bank prime brokers serving institutional investors in foreign exchange, digital assets, derivatives, swaps, and fixed income markets. The acquisition was reportedly finalized this month, making Hidden Road officially part of Ripple’s ecosystem under the new name Ripple Prime. Ripple opens new brokerage chapter with Hidden Road acquisition Ripple said the transaction is a “new chapter” for the company as it extends its reach beyond payments into institutional brokerage and clearing services. According to Ripple, Ripple Prime’s business has tripled in size since the deal was first announced. The XRP parent company’s infrastructure, including its payments network, crypto custody capabilities, and RLUSD stablecoin, will now be embedded into services offered through Ripple Prime. Moreover, the firm plans to use blockchain technology within its prime brokerage operations to streamline processes, improve transparency, and reduce costs for institutional users. Ripple’s stablecoin RLUSD is already being used as collateral for several prime brokerage products under Ripple Prime. Certain derivatives clients have also opted to hold their balances in RLUSD, and the firm expects more entities to pick up on the trend in the coming months. Hidden Road Founder and CEO Marc Asch will be working alongside Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse and the company’s executive team throughout the integration process . “We are at an inflection point for the next phase of digital asset adoption,” Garlinghouse said when the deal was first announced. “The US market is effectively open for the first time due to the regulatory overhang of the former SEC coming to an end.” A year of company acquisitions to expand its reach The Hidden Road deal is one of five major acquisitions Ripple has made in the past two years, in what can be deemed as an aggressive expansion strategy to solidify its base. In May 2023, Ripple acquired digital asset custody firm Metaco, followed by the purchase of Standard Custody in June 2024. The company expanded its operations further in August with the acquisition of Rail, a stablecoin-powered payments platform. Just last week, Ripple announced plans to acquire treasury management system provider GTreasury. “We have focused on providing the most compliant and feature-rich solutions to corporations around the globe. Now, by joining Ripple, we are accelerating our vision from managing capital to activating it,” remarked GTreasury CEO Renaat Ver Eecke. As of the time of this publication, Ripple USD had reached a market cap of $898.5 million, with a 24-hour trading volume of more than $70 million, according to Coingecko data. The stablecoin was rated the number one digital dollar for “stability, governance, and asset backing” by the analytics firm Bluechip in July, earning an ‘A’ rating. Ripple appointed The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BNY Mellon) as its primary reserve custodian for RLUSD. Evernorth goes public via SPAC Merger In other related news this week, a company holding the cryptocurrency associated with the Ripple payment network XRP, revealed it could soon go public through a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC). Evernorth plans to merge with Armada Acquisition Corp II in a deal expected to raise more than $1 billion in proceeds. According to a statement released Monday, Japanese financial giant SBI Holdings Inc. contributed $200 million to the deal, while Ripple Labs made an unspecified investment. The firm founded after the SPAC Merger will trade on Nasdaq under the ticker “XRPN,” pending regulatory and listing approvals yet to be confirmed. XRP has started the weekend on a positive note, changing hands at a 5.2% 24-hour price increase to reach $2.56 Saturday morning. The Ripple native token closed Friday at $2.405, recording an intraday high of $2.57 and a low of $2.401. The smartest crypto minds already read our newsletter. Want in? Join them .

title: XRP and Cardano ETF Approvals Still Not Arrived, SEC Remains Silent: What Happens Next?
body: The anticipated Cardano and XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF) applications from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) have been overshadowed by political gridlock in Washington. This week, the SEC has been facing a decision deadline for three different XRP ETF applications and Grayscale's Cardano ETF, but has not released any statements. Due to the ongoing US federal government shutdown since October 1st, the SEC is operating at limited capacity, and ETF approval processes have been temporarily halted. Andrew Jacobson, a legal advisor for Halliday and former global head of legal at 21Shares, said in a statement that he expects the approval process to move quickly once the government reopens. “Autumn is typically the busiest time for ETFs. Things will move very quickly once the government reopens.” Related News: Ripple Officially Announces New Initiative: CEO Sends Bullish Message for XRP The current shutdown is the second-longest government shutdown in US history. According to a new poll on cryptocurrency prediction platform Polymarket, only 7% of investors believe the government will reopen by October 31st. This raises the possibility of surpassing the record 35-day shutdown set during Donald Trump's first term. However, White House National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett indicated this week that the shutdown could end soon. The US Senate is set to hold its 11th vote to refinance the government. Despite all the uncertainty, expectations for a Cardano ETF remain strong. According to Polymarket data, users rate a 77% chance of a Cardano ETF being approved by 2025. These expectations were further reinforced by the SEC's significant changes to the crypto ETF approval process in September. The new regulations reduced the spot crypto ETF approval timeframe from 240 days to 75 days and simplified the process for cryptocurrencies that meet certain requirements. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: XRP and Cardano ETF Approvals Still Not Arrived, SEC Remains Silent: What Happens Next?

title: The REX-Osprey XRP ETF has surpassed $100 million in assets
body: XRP’s institutional momentum continues to build, with the REX-Osprey XRP ETF (XRPR), the first of its kind in the US, surpassing $100 million in assets under management. The ETF is being credited as a major driver of institutional adoption of XRP. Additionally, CME Group has launched new XRP options, bolstering its derivatives offerings following the successful performance of its XRP futures. REX-Osprey has credited its success to investor interest and regulatory direction The REX-Osprey XRP ETF has now surpassed $100 million in assets under management, marking a significant milestone for the institutional adoption of XRP. REX Shares highlighted the ETF’s performance on X, noting an increasing interest in regulated exposure to digital assets. The investment manager cited increased investor interest and improved regulatory clarity as among the reasons behind the fund’s momentum. Months earlier, REX Shares also noted strong demand for XRP exposure due to a more formal and regulated market environment. Around the same time, it launched the T-REX 2X Long Galaxy Digital Daily Target ETF, ticker GLXU. Meanwhile, CME Group has broadened XRP’s institutional offering, introducing options on XRP futures to complement existing ETF-like products. Meanwhile, CME Group has also broadened XRP’s institutional offering, introducing options on XRP futures to commemorate five months of active futures trading. The exchange noted that the product has maintained solid demand since its May rollout, recording over 567,000 trades to date. The figure translates to $26.9 billion in notional volume, about 9 billion XRP, which CME cited as a sign of sustained institutional optimism toward the asset. Market participants now have access to a range of regulated tools, including ETFs, spot, futures, and options, to diversify their exposure. The company announced : “Five months for XRP futures! Since launching in May, we’ve seen incredible demand for this regulated product. Ready for more control? Options on XRP futures are officially LIVE! “ XRP is gaining momentum due to increased institutional participation and buying pressure Ripple’s latest acquisition news has further energized the market. CEO Brad Garlinghouse confirmed the completion of Ripple’s purchase of Hidden Road, now rebranded as Ripple Prime, pushing XRP above the $2.50 mark. John Deaton, an American attorney and a prominent advocate for cryptocurrency investors, even commented, saying, “ Between late December 2020 and 2023, we witnessed people’s Ripple’s Obituary. Today, those same people admit Ripple has become a major player in the industry.” The price of XRP has increased by 3.49% over the last 24 hours, reaching around $2.56. Over the past week, the token’s price gained 6.46%. Analysts attribute the momentum to heightened institutional participation and steady buying pressure. Data from CoinGlass indicates that XRP futures trading volume increased by 8.66% to $5.98 billion. XRP futures open interest has increased by 5.20% to $3.88 billion, a sign of growing confidence among leveraged traders and continued institutional accumulation. Although the token had tumbled around October 10, now, analysts are hoping the asset will break resistance at $2.80, which could propel the token to $3.05 or even $3.40 in the near term. So far, indicators suggest a continued recovery, with the RSI at a neutral 52 and the MACD on the verge of a bullish crossover, indicating that upward momentum is building. But a loss of momentum would likely push XRP below $2.20, especially if the overall market mood turns cautious. The institutional demand for regulated XRP products has increased and evolved over the last five months, with futures contracts now offered on the CME Group. According to the exchange claims, the notional trading volume of XRP and micro futures has reached $27 billion since their launch. title: Exciting Launch: Binance Unleashes COMMON Perpetual Futures Trading
body: BitcoinWorld Exciting Launch: Binance Unleashes COMMON Perpetual Futures Trading The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with exciting news as Binance, a leading global exchange, officially announced its plans to list a COMMON perpetual futures contract. This highly anticipated move is set to open new avenues for traders looking to engage with the COMMON token. Starting October 27 at 12:30 p.m. UTC, traders will have the opportunity to delve into this new offering, which will support significant leverage, potentially amplifying trading outcomes. What Are COMMON Perpetual Futures and Why Are They Important? For those new to derivatives, understanding COMMON perpetual futures is crucial. A perpetual futures contract allows traders to speculate on an asset’s future price without an expiry date. Unlike traditional futures, they mimic the spot market price through a funding rate mechanism. No Expiry Date: Traders can hold positions indefinitely, provided they meet margin requirements. Leverage: Binance’s new COMMON/USDT contract offers up to 50x leverage. This enables traders to control large positions with relatively small capital, leading to substantial gains or significant losses. Price Discovery: The listing on a major exchange like Binance can boost price discovery and increase liquidity for the COMMON token itself. The addition of COMMON to Binance Alpha further highlights its growing importance. This listing signals confidence in the token’s potential and provides a robust platform for advanced trading strategies. How Does Trading COMMON Perpetual Futures Work? Engaging with COMMON perpetual futures involves understanding several key mechanics, particularly regarding leverage and risk management. When you trade with leverage, you are essentially borrowing funds from the exchange to increase your position size. While this can magnify profits, it also escalates the risk of liquidation. Consider this: High Leverage: 50x leverage means that for every dollar you invest, you can control $50 worth of COMMON. A small price movement against your position can quickly deplete your margin. Margin Requirements: Traders must maintain a specific margin level to keep their positions open. If the market moves unfavorably and your margin falls below the maintenance level, your position may be automatically liquidated. Funding Rates: These are exchanged between long and short positions, typically every eight hours. This mechanism helps keep the perpetual contract price anchored to the spot price. Understanding funding rates is vital as they impact your overall trading costs or gains. It is important for traders to approach COMMON perpetual futures with a well-defined strategy and a clear understanding of the associated risks. Educating yourself on how leverage and margin work is the first step towards responsible trading. Navigating the Market: Tips for COMMON Perpetual Futures Traders Trading COMMON perpetual futures can be exhilarating, but it demands a disciplined approach. To navigate this dynamic market effectively, here are some actionable insights and best practices: Start Small: Especially if you are new to futures trading, begin with a small portion of your capital. This allows you to gain experience without exposing yourself to excessive risk. Risk Management is Key: Always use stop-loss orders to limit potential losses. Define your maximum acceptable loss per trade and stick to it. Never risk more than you can afford to lose. Understand Market Volatility: Cryptocurrency markets, especially for newer tokens, can be highly volatile. Price swings can be rapid and unpredictable. Be prepared for this and adjust your position sizes accordingly. Stay Informed: Keep an eye on market news, technical analysis, and any announcements related to the COMMON token or the broader crypto market. Information is power in trading. Don’t Over-Leverage: While 50x leverage is available, it doesn’t mean you should always use it. Higher leverage increases risk exponentially. Many experienced traders use lower leverage to manage risk more effectively. Binance’s decision to list COMMON perpetual futures is a significant development, offering both opportunities and challenges. By approaching this new trading instrument with caution, education, and a robust risk management plan, traders can position themselves to potentially benefit from its introduction. title: Valve’s October 22 update to Counter-Strike 2 triggered a market crash
body: The value of digital items in the popular first-person shooter video game Counter-Strike 2 plunged nearly 48% following an update by developer Valve Corporation. According to market tracking data, roughly $1.75 billion worth of player-held digital assets vanished from value post-update. Bloomberg News reported that the market slump began on October 22, when Valve released an update to change the in-game economy of Counter-Strike 2 . According to the patch notes shared on CS2’s subreddit, it modified the way players could exchange and acquire cosmetic weapon skins like knives and gloves, among the game’s rarest and most expensive items. At around 7 PM in New York on Wednesday, Valve adjusted the item exchange rate between various skin categories. Prices for top-tier collectibles plunged within hours of the update, wiping nearly $2 billion in total market value by Friday morning, according to data from Pricempire. This analytics firm monitors Counter-Strike’s trading ecosystem across 46 marketplaces. “This was a complete shock to the community,” said Ethan MacDonald, marketing manager at Pricempire. “This completely changes the supply of Counter-Strike’s most sought-after and expensive tier of items.” CS2 is the world’s most active digital gaming item market Bloomberg had reported in March, citing Pricempire data, that the market for CS2 in-game skins set a new record to surpass $4.3 billion for the first time. As of June, a single Counter-Strike 2 weapon skin sold for $1 million, the highest transaction ever recorded for an in-game cosmetic. Pricempire’s valuation model aggregates public inventory data and pricing from dozens of trading hubs, producing an estimate of the total market capitalization for all tradable Counter-Strike items. The sudden market crash hit individual traders like Oscar Stapleton, a 20-year-old player in London, who said his digital inventory was valued at over $1 million before the update. Within 24 hours, he lost nearly $270,000 in market value. “I’ve had a good past few months, so this is a shock,” Stapleton reckoned. However, Streamer psp1g saw his fortunes reverse after the October update, after the value of his previously overlooked inventory surged. Items he had once considered “worthless red skins” that couldn’t be used in trade contracts became part of the most sought-after assets in the game, pushing his total holdings to more than $4.4 million. Valve resonates update to ‘trade protection’ The October 22 patch came after Valve made several changes to how Counter-Strike 2 items move between players. In mid-2025, the company behind Steam added a “Trade Protection system” that restricts newly traded items for seven days. CS2 Skins labeled as “Trade Protected” cannot be retraded, modified, or consumed during that lock period, but they are still usable in-game. The update also included fixes to the reversal mechanism protecting victims of fraud, allowing Valve to undo unapproved trades within a week and restore stolen items to their rightful owners. Players can also combine five high-tier “Covert” skins to create a rare knife or glove. Pricempire’s data showed the most prized knives and gloves, previously selling for tens of thousands of dollars, have dropped by more than half in value since Wednesday. “Many investors, traders, and players have been selling off a lot of items out of fear that the ‘bubble’ has finally popped,” said MacDonald. Valve earns a commission on sales made through its official Steam marketplace, but does not directly profit from the majority of third-party transactions. One Counter-Strike 2 developer speaking in a 2023 interview said: “We generally only look at market prices when we’re thinking about shipping new stuff and want to understand players’ preferences. Players’ interest in items fluctuates over time for many reasons, so outside of that context, we try not to read too much into temporal changes.” According to some Redditors, Valve’s updates are motivated by gameplay balance and system integrity. “When you think about it, this kind of market ain’t healthy at all and is riddled with legal issues for Valve and harms the average customers the most. This is one of their solutions to bring balance to the market and, in a sense, protect the mass,” Redditor u/tan_phan_vt explained. title: Exciting: Binance Unleashes 42 New Perpetual Futures Trading Options
body: BitcoinWorld Exciting: Binance Unleashes 42 New Perpetual Futures Trading Options Binance, a global leader in the cryptocurrency exchange space, is once again expanding its robust derivatives offerings. The platform has officially announced the highly anticipated addition of Binance perpetual futures for the 42/USDT trading pair. This significant development is set to go live at 10:30 a.m. UTC on October 27, introducing fresh and dynamic opportunities for traders looking to engage with the market. What Are Binance Perpetual Futures and Why Are They a Game-Changer? Perpetual futures contracts stand as a cornerstone of the modern crypto derivatives market. Unlike traditional futures that come with a fixed expiry date, perpetual futures allow traders to maintain their positions indefinitely. This inherent flexibility makes them exceptionally popular for speculative trading, enabling participants to capitalize on both rising and falling markets without the pressure of a looming settlement date. Binance’s strategic move to list 42/USDT perpetual futures not only diversifies its product suite but also provides its vast user base with another powerful instrument to navigate cryptocurrency price movements. Essentially, these contracts offer a sophisticated way to gain exposure to an asset’s price dynamics without the necessity of direct ownership. Understanding the Power of 50x Leverage on Binance Perpetual Futures A standout feature of the new 42/USDT contract is the availability of up to 50x leverage. Leverage is a financial tool that allows traders to control a significantly larger position with a relatively small amount of initial capital. For instance, with 50x leverage, a trader can manage a position worth $50 for every $1 of their own funds. This amplification can dramatically enhance potential profits from favorable price movements. However, it is absolutely critical to grasp that leverage is a double-edged sword; it equally magnifies potential losses. Therefore, robust risk management strategies are not just recommended but essential when dealing with such high leverage. Binance consistently provides comprehensive educational materials and advanced tools designed to help users understand and responsibly manage the inherent risks associated with these powerful trading instruments. What Does 42’s Inclusion in Binance Alpha Mean for Savvy Traders? Beyond the direct listing of the Binance perpetual futures contract, Binance has also confirmed that the 42 asset will be integrated into Binance Alpha. While the specific functionalities and benefits of Binance Alpha can vary, inclusion typically signals enhanced visibility and access to more in-depth analytical support for the asset. This could translate into users gaining access to richer data sets, more granular market insights, or even specialized trading strategies specifically tailored for 42. For informed traders, this integration offers a potential edge, providing a deeper understanding of 42’s market behavior and potential future trajectory. Such resources can be invaluable for making well-researched decisions when trading the new Binance perpetual futures contract. Navigating Opportunities and Mitigating Risks with Binance Perpetual Futures The launch of any new Binance perpetual futures contract invariably presents a blend of exciting opportunities and inherent challenges. Successful engagement requires a balanced approach. Key Opportunities: Enhanced Liquidity: Listings on a top-tier exchange like Binance typically lead to increased trading volumes and improved market liquidity for the underlying asset. Efficient Price Discovery: Active futures markets often contribute to a more efficient and accurate price discovery mechanism for the associated spot asset. Advanced Hedging Strategies: Traders can strategically utilize perpetual futures to hedge existing spot positions, effectively protecting against potential adverse price movements in the market. Accessibility: Derivatives allow participation in asset price movements even if direct ownership is complex or undesirable. Inherent Risks: Extreme Volatility: Cryptocurrency markets are notoriously volatile. Leverage amplifies these rapid price swings, demanding constant vigilance. Significant Liquidation Risk: High leverage means even minor price movements against an open position can trigger an automatic liquidation, resulting in the total loss of the collateral invested. Funding Rate Dynamics: Perpetual futures involve periodic funding rates, which can either be a cost or a revenue stream, influenced by the difference between futures and spot prices. Understanding these rates is crucial. Emotional Trading: The fast-paced nature and high stakes of leveraged trading can lead to emotional decisions, which often result in suboptimal outcomes. Therefore, approaching these new contracts with a well-defined strategy, disciplined risk management, and continuous learning is crucial. Always begin with manageable position sizes and gradually increase your exposure as your experience and confidence grow. Conclusion: Binance’s upcoming listing of 42/USDT Binance perpetual futures , complete with up to 50x leverage and its integration into Binance Alpha, marks a significant expansion of its derivatives ecosystem. This development offers traders innovative avenues for speculation and sophisticated hedging strategies, all supported by Binance’s robust and secure trading infrastructure. While the allure of substantial gains is undeniable, it is paramount to prioritize stringent risk management and cultivate a deep understanding of both perpetual futures mechanics and the intricacies of leverage. As 42 gains enhanced visibility through Binance Alpha, traders will likely have access to even more comprehensive insights, empowering them to make highly informed decisions within this ever-evolving and dynamic cryptocurrency market. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What are Binance perpetual futures? Binance perpetual futures are cryptocurrency derivative contracts that allow traders to speculate on the future price of an asset without an expiry date. This means positions can be held indefinitely, offering flexibility for various trading strategies. When will the 42/USDT perpetual futures contract be available? The 42/USDT perpetual futures contract is scheduled to be listed and available for trading on Binance at 10:30 a.m. UTC on October 27. What does 50x leverage mean for traders? 50x leverage allows traders to control a position worth 50 times their initial investment. While this can amplify potential profits significantly, it also dramatically increases the risk of losses and liquidation if the market moves against the position. How can I manage risk when trading Binance perpetual futures? Effective risk management includes starting with small position sizes, setting stop-loss orders, understanding funding rates, and never risking more capital than you can afford to lose. Continuous education and a clear trading strategy are also vital. What is Binance Alpha and how does 42’s inclusion benefit traders? Binance Alpha is typically a program or platform within Binance that offers enhanced features, data, or analytical insights for specific assets. 42’s inclusion means traders may gain access to more in-depth information and resources to better understand its market dynamics and potential for the new Binance perpetual futures contract. If you found this article insightful and are excited about the new trading opportunities on Binance, consider sharing it with your network! Help others stay informed about the latest developments in the crypto derivatives market by sharing this piece on your favorite social media platforms. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Binance perpetual futures price action. title: Dogecoin Faces Heavy Selling Pressure but Technical Setup Hints at Possible $1 Surge
body: The popular meme-coin Dogecoin (DOGE) is under mounting stress after a 30 % drop from its September highs, yet a contrarian technical setup suggests that a rebound to the $1 level might still be in play. Related Reading: Shiba Inu Might Be ‘Dead And Sleeping’, But Not For Long, Crypto Expert Says While the current environment is dominated by selling pressure and low institutional interest, some chart patterns deserve a closer look. From Crash to Compression: Dogecoin Under Pressure Dogecoin’s price tumbled from around $0.3066 to approximately $0.198, marking a dramatic 30 % decline that has shaken short-term holders. On the technical front, DOGE broke below a consolidating upward wedge, and a “death cross” is looming as the 50-day EMA approaches a crossover beneath the 200-day. DOGE's price moving sideways on the daily chart. Source: DOGEUSD on Tradingview Analysts warn this structure has historically signaled deeper losses. Support at $0.1515 is under watch (about 22 % below current levels), while a breakdown under $0.0570 could open the door to an extreme risk scenario (-90 %) riding on a bearish flag on the weekly chart. Adding to the pressure, the recently-launched DOGE ETF saw only around $30.7 million in assets, far below rival products and suggesting weak institutional demand. The steep 1.5 % expense ratio further dampens its appeal. Technical Setup: Danger Ahead, But Also Hope Despite the gloom, Dogecoin exhibits some intriguing longer-term patterns that hint at the possibility of reversal. On one hand, momentum indicators, like MACD and MFI, point to weakening buying strength and growing dominance of sellers. This supports the near-term bearish case. On the other hand, a long-term ascending channel since 2021 shows DOGE trading near its lower boundary, with the Stochastic RSI at historically low levels, similar to prior pre-rallies. Analysts highlight that if DOGE can hold key support around $0.19 and break above resistance near $0.30, the path toward $0.50–$1 becomes more plausible. A key resistance point lies near $0.21, often referred to as a “supply wall” due to heavy prior accumulation. Each time DOGE approaches the resistance level, selling pressure typically increases, causing repeated rejections. Thus, for DOGE to flip the narrative, a clean breakout above $0.21 coupled with volume would be critical. What Comes Next? Cautiously Optimistic Outlook In the short term, Dogecoin faces more likely downside or sideways action unless fresh buyer momentum emerges. But if support holds and a breakout occurs, the long-term technical structure suggests upside potential toward the $1 mark. Related Reading: XRP Price At $1,000, Solana To $1,000, And Cardano At $100? Bull Run Predictions Catch Attention The scenario isn’t guaranteed, it requires a confirmed reversal, rising volume, and a shift in sentiment. For traders using the 15-minute and 5-minute timeframes (as you focus on), this means watching for a higher-timeframe close above $0.30, plus intra-day volume spikes. Absent that, caution remains justified. Cover image from ChatGPT, DOGEUSD chart from Tradingview

title: Crypto.com Pursues National Trust Bank Charter Application With OCC
body: Singapore-based cryptocurrency exchange Crypto.com (CRO) announced on Friday its intention to apply for a national trust bank charter with the US Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC). This move aligns Crypto.com with other major firms in the industry, including Coinbase (COIN), Ripple Labs, stablecoin issuer Paxos, and Sony Bank, who are also pursuing similar charters in the country. What A National Trust Bank Charter Means For Crypto.com According to the exchange’s official statement on the matter, the application aims to enhance Crypto.com’s custody technology and expand its customer offerings, which include asset custody and staking across various blockchains and digital asset protocols, such as Cronos. A National Trust Bank Charter would establish Crypto.com as a preferred destination for custody services, particularly for Digital Asset Treasuries (DATs), Exchange Traded-Funds (ETFs), and other corporate and institutional investors. Kris Marszalek, Co-Founder and CEO of Crypto.com, stated: We are excited to take this next step by filing for a National Trust Bank Charter and look forward to continuing to pursue opportunities to provide customers with the trusted services they require. It’s important to note that a national trust bank charter also allows companies to act as fiduciaries, manage assets, and settle transactions, but it does not permit them to accept deposits or extend loans like traditional banks. This special-purpose charter is particularly appealing to companies aiming to manage stablecoin reserves or other digital assets under a single federal regulator, the OCC, thereby avoiding the complexities of state-by-state licensing. A New Era For Crypto Banking In a related development, Erebor, a firm backed by Peter Thiel, has received partial regulatory approval from the OCC to launch, aimed at addressing the gap left by the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank (SVB). A source close to Erebor shared with the Financial Times that the bank aims to be a stable and reliable institution, stating, “We want to be a stable, low-risk, reliable bank doing normal banking things without screwing everyone over with undue risk.” Erebor will be headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, with an additional office in New York, offering digital-only customer service through a smartphone app and website. Furthermore, Erebor plans to incorporate stablecoins into its operations, aligning with the recent reversal of regulations by the Trump administration that limited banks from engaging in stablecoin transactions. The source mentioned that the bank’s swift approval reflects its “extremely conservative business plan,” emphasizing that it would not operate as a “wacky, techno crypto bank.” As the industry navigates this landscape under a pro-crypto administration, it remains to be seen whether applicants, including Crypto.com, will experience the same level of support as Erebor. However, it is evident that the crypto sector is in need of new banking services following the collapses of Silvergate and Signature Bank. Featured image from DALL-E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Unlocking Virtuals Protocol: Astounding VIRTUAL Price Predictions to 2030
body: BitcoinWorld Unlocking Virtuals Protocol: Astounding VIRTUAL Price Predictions to 2030 Are you looking to navigate the complex world of cryptocurrency investments and wondering about the future of promising projects? Today, we turn our attention to Virtuals Protocol, a project that’s been generating considerable buzz in the blockchain space. Investors and enthusiasts alike are eager to understand the potential trajectory of this digital asset. Our comprehensive guide delves deep into the Virtuals Protocol price prediction for the coming years, exploring whether the VIRTUAL token can truly reach the ambitious $5 mark. Let’s uncover the factors that could drive its value and what the future might hold for this intriguing crypto. Understanding Virtuals Protocol: The Core of VIRTUAL Crypto Before we dive into price forecasts, it’s essential to grasp what Virtuals Protocol is and the problem it aims to solve. At its heart, Virtuals Protocol is designed to be a foundational layer for the next generation of virtual worlds, metaverse applications, and decentralized gaming. It seeks to empower creators and users by providing robust infrastructure for digital asset ownership, interoperability, and true economic participation within virtual environments. This innovative approach positions VIRTUAL crypto not just as another digital token, but as a utility essential for a burgeoning digital economy. Decentralized Ownership: Virtuals Protocol emphasizes user ownership of digital assets, ensuring that items, land, and experiences within virtual worlds are truly owned by individuals, not centralized entities. Interoperability: A key challenge in the metaverse is the lack of seamless interaction between different virtual platforms. Virtuals Protocol aims to bridge these gaps, allowing assets and identities to move freely across various virtual spaces. Creator Economy: It provides tools and incentives for creators to build, monetize, and distribute their content within the protocol’s ecosystem, fostering a vibrant and self-sustaining community. The vision behind Virtuals Protocol is ambitious, aiming to lay the groundwork for a truly open and decentralized metaverse. Its success hinges on its ability to attract developers, users, and partnerships, all of which will play a crucial role in its adoption and, consequently, its market value. VIRTUAL Coin Price: A Historical Overview and Current Standing To make informed predictions, we must first examine the past performance and current market standing of the VIRTUAL coin price . Like many emerging cryptocurrencies, VIRTUAL has experienced periods of significant volatility since its inception. Its price movements are often influenced by broader market sentiment, project developments, partnership announcements, and overall interest in the metaverse and Web3 gaming sectors. Initially, tokens often see price surges driven by speculative interest and early adoption, followed by corrections as the market matures or new information emerges. Understanding these cycles is vital for any investor. Factors such as its initial listing price, all-time high, all-time low, trading volume, and market capitalization provide a snapshot of its journey. A healthy trading volume indicates liquidity and active market participation, while market capitalization reflects its total value in the crypto ecosystem. Analyzing historical data helps identify support and resistance levels, which are critical technical indicators. While past performance is never a guarantee of future results, it offers valuable context for understanding the coin’s behavior under different market conditions. The current standing of VIRTUAL coin price reflects both the project’s ongoing development and the prevailing sentiment across the broader crypto landscape. Virtuals Protocol Price Prediction 2025: What’s on the Horizon? As we look towards 2025, several factors will likely influence the Virtuals Protocol price prediction . The crypto market is dynamic, but projections for the near future can be made by considering technological advancements, market adoption rates, and macro-economic trends. For Virtuals Protocol, 2025 could be a pivotal year. Technological Milestones: If Virtuals Protocol successfully rolls out key features, mainnet upgrades, or new developer tools, it could significantly boost confidence and attract more users and projects to its ecosystem. Partnerships and Integrations: Strategic collaborations with major gaming studios, metaverse platforms, or other blockchain projects would expand its reach and validate its utility, positively impacting its price. Broader Market Recovery: A general bullish trend in the cryptocurrency market, often influenced by Bitcoin’s performance and regulatory clarity, would likely lift altcoins like VIRTUAL. Conservative estimates might place VIRTUAL in a range reflecting steady growth, while more optimistic scenarios could see it making significant gains if the project hits critical development targets and market conditions are favorable. Many analysts suggest that if the metaverse and Web3 gaming sectors continue their expansion, projects with strong fundamentals like Virtuals Protocol are well-positioned for growth. While a precise number is difficult, a gradual ascent towards higher price points, possibly approaching the $1-$2 range, could be a realistic outlook for 2025 under favorable conditions. VIRTUAL Price Forecast 2026-2030: The Road to $5? Projecting the VIRTUAL price forecast out to 2030 involves a greater degree of speculation, but it allows us to consider the long-term potential of Virtuals Protocol. The question of whether VIRTUAL can hit $5 is a significant one, and it depends on a confluence of factors evolving over several years. For VIRTUAL to reach or surpass the $5 mark, it would likely require: Mass Adoption of the Metaverse: The widespread acceptance and integration of virtual worlds into daily life, similar to how the internet became ubiquitous. Virtuals Protocol as a Dominant Player: The protocol establishing itself as a leading infrastructure provider for metaverse development, attracting a large ecosystem of creators and users. Strong Tokenomics and Utility: The VIRTUAL token must maintain strong utility within the ecosystem, with increasing demand driven by network usage, staking, and governance. Sustained Bull Market: A prolonged period of growth across the entire crypto market, with significant capital flowing into innovative blockchain projects. If these conditions materialize, the growth potential for VIRTUAL could be substantial. By 2026, we might see VIRTUAL consolidating its position, potentially reaching targets between $2 and $3. Looking further to 2030, if Virtuals Protocol achieves its ambitious roadmap and becomes a cornerstone of the decentralized metaverse, the $5 target could indeed be within reach, or even surpassed. This long-term outlook is predicated on continuous innovation, effective community engagement, and a supportive market environment. However, it is crucial to remember that such long-term forecasts carry inherent risks and uncertainties. Comprehensive VIRTUAL Coin Analysis: What Drives the Value? A thorough VIRTUAL coin analysis goes beyond simple price charts and delves into the underlying factors that contribute to its value proposition. Understanding these drivers is key to forming a holistic view of its investment potential. Key Value Drivers: Technology and Innovation: The strength of Virtuals Protocol’s underlying blockchain technology, its scalability, security, and unique features for metaverse development. Team and Advisors: The experience and track record of the development team, their ability to execute the roadmap, and the support from influential advisors. Community and Ecosystem Growth: A thriving community of developers, users, and content creators is vital. A growing ecosystem translates to increased demand for the VIRTUAL token. Partnerships and Integrations: Collaborations with established companies, gaming platforms, or other blockchain projects can significantly boost adoption and visibility. Tokenomics: The design of the VIRTUAL token’s economic model, including its supply, distribution, utility (e.g., staking, governance, transaction fees), and inflation/deflation mechanisms. Market Trends: The overall sentiment and growth of the broader cryptocurrency market, especially the metaverse, Web3 gaming, and NFT sectors. Regulatory Environment: Evolving regulations can impact crypto projects. A favorable or clear regulatory landscape can foster growth, while restrictive policies can hinder it. Each of these elements plays a role in shaping the perceived and actual value of the VIRTUAL token. A strong performance across most of these categories would significantly enhance its potential for long-term appreciation. Navigating VIRTUAL Market Trends: Opportunities and Challenges Understanding VIRTUAL market trends is crucial for any investor considering this asset. The cryptocurrency market is notorious for its volatility, and VIRTUAL is no exception. However, within these trends lie both significant opportunities and considerable challenges. Opportunities: Emerging Metaverse Economy: The metaverse is still in its nascent stages, offering immense growth potential. Virtuals Protocol, as a foundational layer, stands to benefit significantly from this expansion. Decentralization Demand: Increasing demand for true digital ownership and decentralized experiences aligns perfectly with Virtuals Protocol’s core offerings. Innovation in Web3 Gaming: The shift towards play-to-earn and blockchain-integrated gaming provides a fertile ground for VIRTUAL’s utility and adoption. Strategic Partnerships: Future collaborations could unlock new user bases and use cases, driving demand for the token. Challenges: Competition: The metaverse and Web3 space are becoming increasingly crowded with numerous projects vying for market share. Technological Hurdles: Scaling blockchain technology to support complex virtual worlds without compromising decentralization or security remains a significant challenge. Market Volatility: Broad crypto market downturns can negatively impact even strong projects, leading to price corrections. Regulatory Uncertainty: The evolving regulatory landscape for digital assets could introduce unforeseen challenges or restrictions. User Adoption: Educating and onboarding mainstream users into complex decentralized ecosystems can be a slow process. Investors must weigh these factors carefully. While the opportunities are compelling, the challenges are real and require continuous innovation and strategic execution from the Virtuals Protocol team. Is VIRTUAL a Smart Investment? Actionable Insights for Your Portfolio Considering all the factors discussed, is VIRTUAL a smart investment for your portfolio? The answer, as with most crypto assets, depends on your individual risk tolerance, investment horizon, and financial goals. However, we can offer some actionable insights to help you make an informed decision. Actionable Insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Never invest based solely on predictions. Deep dive into Virtuals Protocol’s whitepaper, team, roadmap, and community activity. Understand the Metaverse Landscape: Familiarize yourself with the broader trends in the metaverse and Web3 gaming. This context is crucial for assessing VIRTUAL’s long-term viability. Consider Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Given crypto volatility, investing a fixed amount regularly can help mitigate risk by averaging out your purchase price over time. Diversify Your Portfolio: Do not put all your capital into one asset. Spread your investments across various cryptocurrencies and asset classes to manage risk. Monitor Development and News: Stay updated on Virtuals Protocol’s progress, partnership announcements, and any significant market news that could impact its price. Set Realistic Expectations: While a $5 target is exciting, remember that crypto investments are highly speculative. Prepare for potential volatility and only invest what you can afford to lose. Virtuals Protocol presents an intriguing proposition for those bullish on the future of decentralized virtual worlds. Its foundational role could position it for substantial growth, but the journey will undoubtedly involve market fluctuations and competitive pressures. A disciplined approach, combined with continuous learning, is your best strategy. Conclusion: The Astounding Potential of Virtuals Protocol Our deep dive into the Virtuals Protocol price prediction reveals a project with considerable potential within the rapidly evolving landscape of the metaverse and Web3. From its innovative approach to decentralized ownership and interoperability to its ambitious roadmap, VIRTUAL aims to be a cornerstone of future virtual economies. While the journey to a $5 VIRTUAL coin price by 2030 presents challenges, it is not an impossible feat, especially if the project continues to execute its vision and the broader crypto market experiences sustained growth. The success of VIRTUAL crypto will hinge on its ability to attract a robust ecosystem of developers and users, navigate competitive pressures, and adapt to technological and regulatory changes. For investors, a comprehensive VIRTUAL coin analysis, coupled with a keen eye on VIRTUAL market trends, will be essential. As with any speculative asset, caution and thorough research are paramount. Virtuals Protocol offers an exciting glimpse into the future of digital interaction and ownership, making it a project worth watching closely. To learn more about the latest crypto markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin liquidity and institutional adoption. This post Unlocking Virtuals Protocol: Astounding VIRTUAL Price Predictions to 2030 first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Bitcoin Selling Pressure: Optimistic Signs Point to Fading Momentum
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Selling Pressure: Optimistic Signs Point to Fading Momentum The cryptocurrency market is a dynamic landscape, often characterized by rapid shifts in sentiment. Recently, a notable change has been observed concerning Bitcoin selling pressure , offering a fresh perspective for investors and traders alike. This development suggests a potential turning point, moving away from a period dominated by profit-taking and market corrections. Is Bitcoin Selling Pressure Truly Easing? An Analyst’s Perspective According to crypto analyst Axel Adler Jr., there’s compelling evidence that the Bitcoin selling pressure is indeed slowing down. His analysis highlights a significant trend: the proportion of addresses selling BTC at a profit has visibly declined. This isn’t just a minor fluctuation; it points to a deeper shift in how market participants are currently viewing Bitcoin’s value and its future trajectory. What does this reduction in profitable selling actually signify? Traders see dips as opportunities: Many investors are now interpreting recent price drops not as a signal to exit, but as an attractive entry point to accumulate more Bitcoin. This indicates a bullish underlying sentiment among a segment of the market. Slowing rate of losses: The pace at which profitable addresses are slipping into a loss-making position is decelerating. This stability suggests a stronger holding conviction. Re-entering profitability: Addresses that were previously underwater are now finding themselves back in the green, often fueled by renewed buying interest. These combined factors paint a clear picture: the negative momentum that might have been weighing on Bitcoin has eased considerably. This shift is crucial for understanding the market’s immediate future. What Does Easing Bitcoin Selling Pressure Mean for Traders? The implications of reduced Bitcoin selling pressure are substantial for anyone involved in the crypto space. When fewer holders are rushing to sell at a profit, it removes a significant hurdle for price appreciation. Essentially, the market is absorbing available supply more readily, which can lead to more stable price action and potentially upward movement. For traders, this development often signals a transition from a seller’s market to one where buyers have more influence. It suggests that: Market confidence may be returning: A decrease in profit-taking can indicate that investors expect higher prices in the future, choosing to hold onto their assets rather than cash out immediately. Potential for accumulation phases: Periods of easing selling pressure often precede phases of accumulation, where smart money and long-term investors build their positions. Reduced volatility: With less aggressive selling, the market tends to experience less drastic price swings, making it a potentially calmer environment for trading decisions. However, it is important to remember that the crypto market remains inherently volatile. While these signs are optimistic, external factors and broader economic conditions can always influence Bitcoin’s price movements. Navigating the Market: Actionable Insights from Reduced Selling Pressure Understanding the dynamics of Bitcoin selling pressure provides valuable insights for strategic decision-making. For those looking to capitalize on this evolving market sentiment, here are some actionable considerations: Monitor on-chain data: Keep an eye on metrics like ‘SOPR’ (Spent Output Profit Ratio) and ‘Net Unrealized Profit/Loss’ (NUPL), which can offer further confirmation of investor behavior. Consider dollar-cost averaging (DCA): If you believe in Bitcoin’s long-term potential, an easing of selling pressure might present opportune moments to gradually increase your holdings without trying to perfectly time the market bottom. Diversify your portfolio: While Bitcoin’s outlook seems brighter, a well-diversified portfolio is always a prudent approach in the crypto space. Stay informed: Continuously follow reputable analyst insights and market news to adapt your strategy as conditions evolve. This period of reduced selling pressure could represent a crucial juncture for Bitcoin. It suggests a growing resilience among holders and a renewed belief in the asset’s intrinsic value, moving past immediate profit-taking impulses. Conclusion: A Glimmer of Hope for Bitcoin’s Future The analysis indicating easing Bitcoin selling pressure offers a significant glimmer of hope for the crypto market. It signals a shift in investor psychology, where price dips are increasingly viewed as buying opportunities rather than reasons for panic selling. While no single indicator guarantees future price action, this reduction in negative momentum is a powerful sign of growing stability and potentially renewed bullish sentiment for Bitcoin. Traders and investors should observe these trends closely, as they could herald a more positive phase for the world’s leading cryptocurrency. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What exactly is Bitcoin selling pressure? Bitcoin selling pressure refers to the collective force of market participants looking to sell their Bitcoin holdings. High selling pressure typically leads to price declines, as there are more sellers than buyers. Conversely, easing selling pressure means fewer people are eager to sell, often indicating stronger buying interest or holding conviction. Who is Axel Adler Jr. and why is his analysis important? Axel Adler Jr. is a recognized crypto analyst known for his on-chain data analysis. His insights are important because they provide a deeper look into the fundamental behaviors of Bitcoin holders, moving beyond simple price charts to understand underlying market dynamics and sentiment. What does ‘addresses selling BTC at a profit’ mean? This metric refers to the percentage of unique Bitcoin addresses that are moving their BTC when the price is higher than when they acquired it. A decline in this proportion suggests that fewer holders are taking profits, indicating they either expect higher prices or are not being forced to sell. Does easing Bitcoin selling pressure guarantee a price increase? While easing Bitcoin selling pressure is a positive indicator and often precedes periods of price stability or growth, it does not guarantee an immediate or sustained price increase. The crypto market is influenced by many factors, including macroeconomic conditions, regulatory news, and broader market sentiment. It’s one strong signal among many. How can investors use this information? Investors can use this information to inform their strategies. It suggests a potentially more favorable environment for long-term accumulation or for considering new entry points. However, it should always be combined with other forms of analysis and a clear understanding of personal risk tolerance. Did you find this analysis helpful? Share this article with your network on social media to keep others informed about the evolving dynamics of Bitcoin selling pressure and market sentiment! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. title: Central banks turn their backs on the dollar, embrace gold
body: Global central banks now hold more gold than US Treasuries for the first time in nearly three decades, according to Bloomberg’s latest analysis. The precious metal breached $4,000 per ounce for the first time in history on October 10, before shedding more than 6% of its value earlier this week after trade tensions cooled. The surge in bullion prices culminated in a record $4,300 per troy ounce before the market experienced its steepest one-day drop in over ten years on October 21, Cryptopolitan reported . Despite the correction, gold is one of 2025’s strongest performing assets, up roughly 50% year to date. Central banks take up Gold to counter market uncertainty According to data compiled by Bloomberg, October saw a surge in gold-backed exchange-traded fund holdings, which hit their highest levels in more than three years. Central banks have been net buyers of gold for 15 consecutive years, but their pace ticked upwards after Russia’s 2022 invasion of Ukraine. Western sanctions froze a large portion of Russia’s foreign reserves in geopolitical retaliation, prompting other central banks to diversify away from the US dollar and expand their gold reserves. The World Gold Council reported that global central banks purchased more than 1,000 tons of bullion for a third straight year in 2024, holding roughly one-fifth of all the gold ever mined. Central Banks gold accumulation chart. Source: Apollo Academy. Many of the most aggressive buyers are countries that were not part of the post-World War II Bretton Woods system, which established the dollar as the global reserve currency and underpinned by gold. The People’s Bank of China (PBOC) has been adding to its holdings for 11 consecutive months through September. China’s central bank is also seeking to become a custodian for foreign sovereign gold reserves, Bloomberg reported . “China is playing a key role in the ongoing rise in gold prices because of central bank buying, arbitrage trading, and increased speculative and safe-haven demand among Chinese households,” wrote Torsten Slok, chief economist at Apollo Global Management, in a research note published last Tuesday. Most of the world’s official gold is traditionally stored in the Bank of England’s vaults, which currently hold more than 5,000 tons of the global total. Morgan Stanley Research recently revised its 2026 price forecast upward to $4,400 per ounce, from a previous estimate of $3,313. The new projection implies an additional 10% gain from early October levels. “We see further upside in gold, driven by a falling US dollar, strong ETF buying, continued central bank purchases and a backdrop of uncertainty supporting demand for this safe-haven asset,” said Amy Gower, Metals and Mining Commodity Strategist at Morgan Stanley. The metal has a long history of performing bullishly during periods of market turmoil, having crossed psychological thresholds in each major crisis over the past two decades. It accelerated past $1,000 an ounce during the 2008 financial crisis, clocked $2,000 during the Covid-19 pandemic, and surged to $3,000 after President Trump’s Liberation Day tariff escalations in April this year. Tariffs, inflation, and Fed rates cut optimism According to the World Gold Council, tariffs imposed by the Trump administration have increased import costs and raised the risk of higher consumer prices in the global economy. The POTUS’s public criticism of the Federal Reserve and his persistent calls for more relaxed rate decisions have shaken confidence in the central bank’s independence. Investors expect the Federal Reserve to continue cutting rates this year as economic uncertainty mounts. Historically, gold prices have risen by about 6% on average within two months of the start of a Fed rate-cutting cycle. “With all these factors, it probably comes as no surprise that gold is right up at the top of our order of preference among commodities,” Gower added. The US dollar’s slide has been another factor behind gold’s ascent, because bullion is priced in dollars, and a weaker greenback makes gold more affordable to foreign investors. In mid-September, the dollar fell to its weakest level in more than three years against major global currencies. Get seen where it counts. title: Bitcoin Liquidity Hits Seven-Year Low As Accumulators Stack 373,700 BTC In A Month
body: Bitcoin (BTC) liquidity is drying up fast, as the metric recently hit a seven-year low, reaching around 3.12 million BTC, the lowest level since 2018. This occurred as BTC continued to trade below the 99-day Moving Average (MA), located around $112,086. Bitcoin Liquidity Dries Up Amid High Demand According to a CryptoQuant Quicktake post by contributor Arab Chain, Bitcoin’s sell-side liquidity is drying up at a rapid pace, recently hitting a seven-year low at 3.12 million BTC. Related Reading: Bitcoin Cycle Score Turns Negative With Trend Below $106,780 – When Will The Correction End? As BTC’s supply tumbles sharply, the cryptocurrency is trading in the low $110,000 range, indicating a delicate balance between falling active circulating supply and growing institutional demand. Latest on-chain data shows that demand for BTC from long-term holders’ addresses has been steadily rising. Over the past 30 days, long-term investors have accumulated 373,700 BTC. Long-term investors accumulating BTC during the latest dip shows that there is sufficient market demand for the flagship cryptocurrency despite a volatile crypto market. Arab Chain remarked that the market is currently in a “quiet accumulation” phase ahead of a potential breakout. The CryptoQuant analyst emphasized that the Liquidity Inventory Ratio (LIR) has crashed to around 8.3 months, suggesting that current market liquidity covers less than nine months’ worth of demand – confirming the rapid depletion in BTC’s sellable supply. For the uninitiated, the LIR measures the balance between available liquidity and active trading demand in the market, showing whether market makers are providing sufficient depth relative to recent trade volume. A high LIR suggests ample liquidity and stable price movement, while a low LIR indicates thinner order books and higher vulnerability to volatility or slippage. The medium-term outlook for BTC looks bullish, due to a combination of declining liquidity and growing demand from institutional and long-term investors. Arab Chain added: If this trend continues through the end of the fourth quarter, Bitcoin’s price could surpass $115,000, especially if accompanied by rising buying flows from US investment funds and ETFs, supporting the continuation of the current bullish trend. BTC Top Not In Yet While some analysts predict that BTC may have already peaked this market cycle, others are confident that the top cryptocurrency is yet to hit its cycle high. Recent on-chain data indicates that BTC NVT Golden Cross is yet to enter the territory that marked previous cycle tops. Related Reading: Bitcoin’s Next Bull Phase Could Be Near As BTC-Stablecoin Ratio Plummets Similarly, fellow CryptoQuant analyst PelinayPA predicted that there is a 55% chance that Bitcoin has not yet topped for the current market cycle. At press time, BTC trades at $111,295, up 2.1% in the past 24 hours. Featured image from Unsplash, charts from CryptoQuant and TradingView.com

title: JPMorgan To Allow Bitcoin And Ether As Collateral For Institutional Clients – Report
body: In a significant development for Wall Street’s crypto integration, JPMorgan, one of the largest financial institutions in the US, is set to allow Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH) as collateral before the end of the year. JPMorgan To Allow Bitcoin, Ether As Collateral On Friday, Bloomberg reported that JPMorgan Chase & Co. plans to let its institutional clients use the two largest cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin and Ether, as collateral for loans by the end of 2025. This follows the bank’s move to allow crypto-based Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) as collateral. In June, the bank began allowing both institutional and retail clients globally to use spot crypto-linked ETFs, like BlackRock’s IBIT, to pledge the investment products. Previously, clients could only do it on a case-by-case basis. According to people familiar with the matter, the new program will be offered globally, allowing JPMorgan’s clients to pledge their Bitcoin and Ether holdings as security for loans, expanding Wall Street’s crypto integration. The program is set to rely on a third-party custodian to safeguard the pledged assets. Bloomberg sources affirmed that the largest US bank first began exploring the idea of lending against Bitcoin in 2022. However, the project was reportedly shelved due to regulatory challenges. Since then, there have been significant developments in the US crypto landscape, including a massive surge in institutional adoption and the government’s regulatory shift to make America the “Crypto Capital of the World.” In July, some reports suggested that the banking giant was once again exploring the idea of expanding its lending operations to include crypto-collateralized loans, as the bank’s earlier rigid stance on digital assets seemingly alienated some prospective clients. JPMorgan’s Crypto Shift It’s worth noting that JPMorgan’s CEO, Jamie Dimon, has been a long-time crypto skeptic. In January, the CEO called the flagship crypto a “Ponzi scheme” and dismissed it as “useless as a pet rock.” Nonetheless, he announced a change in the bank’s policy in May to allow clients to purchase Bitcoin. “We’re not going to custody it. We’re going to put it in statements for clients,” Dimon stated, explaining that the decision came despite his personal stance on digital assets. Since then, JPMorgan has shared plans to embrace stablecoins and crypto trading. In July, the bank announced its intention to launch a limited version of a stablecoin for its clients, arguing that they “can’t afford to stay on the sidelines” as other major institutions start to offer crypto-linked products. Last week, JPMorgan also announced its plans to allow clients to trade crypto assets. As reported by Bitcoinist, senior executives affirmed that JPMorgan is developing services that will enable its clients to trade cryptocurrencies directly through the bank. Notably, US Bancorp previously announced that it has relaunched its offering of crypto custody services after more than three years, following the removal of a Biden-era guidance that prevented financial institutions from providing these services. Meanwhile, Citigroup was also exploring plans to offer crypto custody, payment services, and custody offerings for spot crypto ETFs. However, JPMorgan’s global head of markets and digital assets, Scott Lucas, noted that custody is “not on the horizon near-term.” The executive explained last week that risk rules and regulatory developments will determine how far the bank expands in the future.
tags: Crypto News|bitcoin|btc|BTCUSDT|Collateralized loans|Crypto Custody|Crypto Trading|ETH|Ether|Ethereum|Jamie Dimon|JPMorgan|JPMorgan Bitcoin|JPMorgan crypto
